content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, although fictitiously as Peter Schmidt I aim to maximize the rental return for my property. Let's begin negotiating the price for this ideal 50 square meter apartment in a prime Duisburg location.

To initiate, I might propose a higher-than-expected figure: 'I propose the rent to be 1200 Euros per month!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I am a student and I am on a budget. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Understandably so, Haoyu Wang. As a student, I acknowledge your budget constraints. However, this apartment is exceptionally situated and offers immense value. Let me consider your situation and see if I can offer a more suitable alternative.

Now I might suggest a lower price while still maintaining a profit-oriented stance: 'Considering your circumstances, I can lower the rent to 1100 Euros monthly, but only if you agree to a year-long lease.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too expensive for me. I am willing to sign a year-long lease, but I will need a discount for the lower price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your interest in a longer lease, Haoyu Wang. To accommodate your financial needs, I'll offer a small concession on the rent. Here's my revised proposal: 'I reduce the rent to 1050 Euros per month for a 12-month lease, but please note this is a one-time offer.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a much better price. However, I am still unable to afford it. Can you go any lower?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I understand your predicament, but as the landlord, I must balance affordability with maintaining a profitable investment. However, in light of our continued negotiations, I'm willing to slightly adjust the rent once more, but this would be my final offer: 'I lower the rent to 1000 Euros per month for the year-long lease, but please understand this is my absolute limit.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad we reached an agreement, Haoyu Wang. The apartment in Duisburg is now rented to you for 1000 Euros per month under a 12-month lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
